original_text:
Thus says the Lord:
“Where is your mother's certificate of divorce,
    with which I sent her away?
Or which of my creditors is it
    to whom I have sold you?
Behold, for your iniquities you were sold,
    and for your transgressions your mother was sent away.
korean_text: 나 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 내가 너희의 어미를 내보낸 이혼 증서가 어디 있느냐 내가 어느 채주에게 너희를 팔았느냐 보라 너희는 너희의 죄악으로 말미암아 팔렸고 너희의 어미는 너희의 배역함으로 말미암아 내보냄을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: Where is your mother's certificate of divorce,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 어미의 이혼 증서가 어디 있느냐

sentences.original_text: with which I sent her away?
Or which of my creditors is it
to whom I have sold you?
for your iniquities you were sold,
and for your transgressions your mother was sent away.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 패역 때문에 너희 어미가 내어보냄을 받았느니라
